subject: Basketball
Basketball (College)
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The newly reconstituted Big East Conference has hired Val Ackerman, a former W.N.B.A. president and a member of the Women’s Basketball Hall of Fame, as its commissioner.
snippet: The newly reconstituted Big East Conference has hired Val Ackerman, a former W.N.B.A. president and a member of the Women’s Basketball Hall of Fame, as its commissioner.
